coming off the best season of his career, leading the Eagles to an NFC East title.`` I'm enjoying the guys and I'm enjoying being out here playing football,'' he said. This is what you work for. You work hard to get in this position. I'm ecstatic to be here. Michael Vick , 30, was selected to start Sunday after leading the NFC with more than 1.5 million votes, far ahead of Minnesota Vikings running back Adrian Peterson , the NFC's second-leading vote-getter at 948,410.

to lift her legs on command. With her closest friends from Congress holding her hand Wednesday evening, Gabrielle Giffords opened her left eye and tried to focus on loved ones for the first time. It was raw courage. It was raw strength. It was so beautiful and so moving, Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand of New York said of the Arizona legislator.`` She wanted us to know that she was with us a hundred percent and understood everything we were saying.'' Gabrielle Giffords ' husband, Mark Kelly, realized the significance of the moment.`` Gabrielle Giffords , open your eyes, open your eyes,'' he said, according to Kirsten Gillibrand . Said Debbie Wasserman Schultz : It felt like we were watching a miracle. So how did Gabrielle Giffords survive the gunshot wound?
